entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of ice pellets before morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
